name: Round Rotate
description:
Round Rotate is a side-scrolling puzzle platformer involving gravity changing. Inspired by VVVVVV and Innoquous, with some spices of Marble Blast, roll through 50 stages full of gravity-switching stages full of puzzles, dangerous hazards and shiny stars that you MUST collect before advancing.

Features

  • 50 awesome stages!
  • 20 adorable ball designs to suit your style with!
  • Came with 2 background music, selectable from the Settings screen!
  • Xbox 360 (also One) controller support!
  • A sticker center!?

Music used

  • Rotate and Gravitate, my own masterpiece
  • Pinball Spring, by Kevin MacLeod
